arts.ttl: Chelsea deserved their victory over Liverpool and Enzo Maresca uncovered a jewel in this confidence-boosting triumph... but there was one pathetic part of their game that left me EMBARRASSED, writes OLIVER HOLT
arts.sum: OLIVER HOLT AT STAMFORD BRIDGE: Chelsea's win moved them up to sixth place in the table and knocked Liverpool off the top, as they were replaced at the summit by Arsenal .
